translation:
Dear Bernardina of Piratini heart, December 14, 1837.

In the haste with which the bearer is about to leave, this letter serves only to inform you that I am much improved in my foot; besides this, I inform you that tomorrow my friend Bento Gonçalves will arrive here, after which it may be that I pay a visit there.

Send me word how our children are doing, to whom you will give many embraces, and recommend me to the godfather and godmother, and likewise to the family of José Rodrigues; and you can always count on your very loving husband Almeida.

Recommendations from me to Your Grace Carlota. Peçanha

Lady. Pedras Altas.
